section.title: Luthetus.Ide.RazorLib.JsRuntimes.Models.LuthetusIdeJavaScriptInteropApi Class Reference

listitem.para: This function is intended to only be invoked from C# when the LuthetusHostingKind is Photino..

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: This class is an exception to the naming convention, "don't use the word 'Luthetus' in class names".

Reason for this exception: the 'IJSRuntime' datatype is far more common in code, than some specific type (example: DialogDisplay.razor). So, adding 'Luthetus' in the class name for redundancy seems meaningful here.
Definition at line 12 of file LuthetusIdeJavaScriptInteropApi.cs.

PreventDefaultBrowserKeybindings() PreventDefaultBrowserKeybindingsLuthetus.Ide.RazorLib.JsRuntimes.Models.LuthetusIdeJavaScriptInteropApi Luthetus.Ide.RazorLib.JsRuntimes.Models.LuthetusIdeJavaScriptInteropApiPreventDefaultBrowserKeybindings
ValueTask Luthetus.Ide.RazorLib.JsRuntimes.Models.LuthetusIdeJavaScriptInteropApi.PreventDefaultBrowserKeybindings ( )
This function is intended to only be invoked from C# when the LuthetusHostingKind is Photino..
Because when running the native application, the fact that, for example, 'F5' refreshes the native application is very frustrating.
